subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] I dont think name calling is aceptible
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_009D_01CA1FE8.25A34050
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

I do agree in that I don't like it when people start hurling personal insul=
ts. We should all be able to conduct civil debate.

But....

Yahoo groups a=
re not democracies. They are products generated from personal opinion. If y=
ou find yourself in a group that you feel treats you unfairly, you are alwa=
ys free to unsub and join a different one.

Having said all that, I have no=
t been here very long, but long enough to observe that Frank's bark is wors=
e than his bite ;)

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: John Brill 
  T=
o: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, August 18, 2009 8:26 AM
  Subj=
ect: Re: [EVP-ITC] I dont think name calling is aceptible


    
  Zack,

 =
 I do not meen to offend anyone but I do not think just because you are a p=
erson who started this forum that you have the rite to insult and offend pe=
ople for speaking there opinion.

  Is that not what this and other groups =
are about. someone else said the rules here are if you are insulting or mea=
n then you will be baned does that not go for every one or is it just a few=
 people can say what they want and others will be baned ?

  I said I did n=
ot meen to insult anyone but I feel there is an injustuce here and favorats=
m wich is wrong in any group.

  why is it do as i say not as i do. the rul=
es should be for everyone no matter what. if you aply this thinking to ever=
y thing we would be living in a world were people were in prison for doing =
a crime and the people in goverment could do as they please to sell drugs o=
r kill or whatever and get away with it.

  we should not have to be USED T=
O someone who can akt and insult who ever he wants too when ever he wants t=
oo.

  that is my opinion.
  pleese forgive my english.

  John




-------=
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
  F=
rom: Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@...>
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  Sent:=
 Tuesday, August 18, 2009 9:08:34 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] I dont think =
name calling is aceptible

    

  Well, it's his group (he doesn't own it =
now but he started it) and he's the one who invented the box and builds the=
m and supplies us with all the info on them. His name is Frank Sumption.

 =
 Those of us who have been around here half of forever are used to him and =
aren't offended.

  Zack


  On Mon, Aug 17, 2009 at 6:48 PM, jba5656 <jba5=
656@yahoo. com> wrote:

      
    I am sorry but I do not think it is acep=
tible for this FS to call someone a DICK for expessing an opinion or to say=
 BITE ME to that person.

    on another group this would not be tolerated =
the person would be warned on the group and then asked to leave. I have see=
n this with a few people here and since I spoke up before I hope I will not=
 be insulted.

    I am sorry for my earlier post I do not wish to make eni=
mies just learn.

    John
